name: Wikipedia Search for Artificial Intelligence
description: Validate the search functionality on Wikipedia.org and verify the completeness and organization of the 'Artificial intelligence' article.
requirements: In the search input field on the homepage, type "artificial intelligence"
Press the Enter key to initiate the search
Verify that the browser navigates to the 'Artificial intelligence' article page
Verify the article contains a 'History' section header
Verify the article contains an 'Applications' section header
Verify the article contains an 'Ethics' section header
Verify there is at least one image displayed in the article body
Verify there is a visible infobox (useful information box) on the right side of the article
Confirm the overall layout appears professional, with clear headings, well-organized content, and no major visual defects
